Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Sonata in C major, D 279

1815

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2] · [IMSLP page 3] · [IMSLP page 4]

Total duration: 23'

  • 1. Allegro moderato
  • 2. Andante
  • 3. Menuetto: Allegro vivace
  • Menuetto in A minor, D 277A
  • Allegretto in C major, D 346
  • Rondo in C major, D 309A

The sonata is missing a final movement. This is often taken to be the allegretto in C major (D 346) or the rondo in C major (D 309A).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/1 · BA 5553 · Klaviersonaten I · ed. Walburga Litschauer [including D 309A]
  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/4 · BA 5525 · Klavierstücke I · ed. David Goldberger [D 277A and 346]
  • Associated Board · Complete Pianoforte Sonatas / Volume I · ed. Howard Ferguson [including D 346]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9642 · Klaviersonaten I / Die frühen Sonaten · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Henle · HN 150 · Klaviersonaten / Band III · ed. Paul Mies [including D 277A and 346, latter with completion by Paul Badura-Skoda]
  • Henle · HN 151 · Klaviersonaten / Band III · ed. Paul Mies [including D 277A and 346, latter with completion by Paul Badura-Skoda]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50220 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band 1 · ed. Martino Tirimo [including D 277A and 346, latter with completion by Martino Tirimo]

1. Allegro moderato

Duration: 9'

Difficulty: 3

2. Andante

Duration: 5' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Menuetto: Allegro vivace

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2

Menuetto in A minor, D 277A

This movement exists in an earlier version (D 277A).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2

Allegretto in C major, D 346

This piece is incomplete.

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3

Rondo in C major, D 309A

This piece is incomplete.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1
